SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: USR_USP_UMHS_INTERACTION_ADDRECIP
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: UM Dev
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
CREATE PROCEDURE DBO.USR_USP_UMHS_INTERACTION_ADDRECIP(@INTERACTIONID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, @CHANGEAGENTID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER=NULL, @CHANGEDATE DATETIME =NULL) AS SET NOCOUNT ON;
--GET THE MAIN INTERACTION CONSTITUENT DECLARE @CONSTITUENTID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER = ( SELECT D.CONSTITUENTID FROM USR_UMHS_INTERACTION I JOIN USR_UMHS_DATA D ON D.ID = I.UMHSID WHERE I.ID = @INTERACTIONID )
IF @CHANGEAGENTID IS NULL EXEC USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID OUTPUT;
IF @CHANGEDATE IS NULL SET @CHANGEDATE=GETDATE();
--GET THE PARTICIPANTS AND BUILD THE RECIPROCAL RECORDS DECLARE @RP TABLE( RECIPID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, UMHSID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER )
INSERT INTO @RP SELECT P.CONSTITUENTID, RECIP.ID FROM DBO.USR_UMHS_INTERACTIONPARTICIPANT P LEFT JOIN USR_UMHS_DATA RECIP ON RECIP.CONSTITUENTID = P.CONSTITUENTID WHERE P.INTERACTIONID = @INTERACTIONID
DECLARE @ID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, @RECIPID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, @UMHSID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER
WHILE EXISTS(SELECT TOP 1 RECIPID FROM @RP) BEGIN SET @ID = NEWID() --CREATE NEW INTERACTIONID
SELECT TOP 1 @RECIPID = RECIPID, @UMHSID = UMHSID FROM @RP
IF @UMHSID IS NULL --create MIMED Record EXEC DBO.USR_USP_UMHS_CREATEFROMCONSTITUENT @UMHSID = @UMHSID OUTPUT, @CONSTITUENTID = @RECIPID
--clean up the temp table DELETE FROM @RP WHERE RECIPID = @RECIPID END
